title: Redeemed Riven Hood
body:
I recently bought this skin and was pretty disappointed when i saw the in-game model.
Are you able to /t the hood so she takes it on/off
Or at least show a bit of her hair and face like it does in the splash art?

replies.body: neon vi uses taunt to do it?
If it were any other champion I will agree, but not riven. IMO riven should be nerfed to the ground or even reworked.
